item.title: æ/alias+ns
item.description: Macros to ease the use of namespace aliases in Clojure. https://github.com/EducatedAlmost/alias-ns.git Qualified keywords have ballooned in popularity since the release of spec with Clojure 1.9. And thankfully so! A creed amongst Clojurians is that maps should be open to modification, meaning that I should be able to add data to a map without worrying that it will break its consumer, and that when processing maps we shouldn't remove data using something like select-keys without good reason.
